arts.ttl: Barca told Flick’s team can be ‘better than Guardiola’s’
arts.sum: “This Barça can end up being better than Pep Guardiola’s, I really believe it because this team has one more thing, it runs a lot. Savo Milosevic has revealed just how impressed he’s been with Hansi Flick’s Barcelona and believes they can be better even than Pep Guardiola’s famous side.

arts.ttl: Kounde serves up Champions League masterclass for Barca
arts.sum: Much of their prowess in front of goal on Wednesday night was down to the excellence of Jules Kounde in the right-back position. For the first time in his entire senior career, Jules Koundé has recorded three assists in the same match.

arts.ttl: Pau Cubarsí injury update after Barcelona’s win over Red Star
arts.sum: An update on the wellbeing of Barcelona star Pau Cubarsí has come to the fore online late on Wednesday. This comes after the young defender was forced into a premature…

arts.ttl: Red Star Belgrade 2-5 Barcelona: Highlights, man of the match, stats from eye-catching Champions League affair
arts.sum: Robert Lewandowski scores twice as Barcelona record a 5-2 victory over Red Star Belgrade in the Champions League on Wednesday night.

arts.ttl: Red Star Belgrade 2-5 Barcelona: Player ratings as quickfire goals decide action-packed tie
arts.sum: Barcelona player ratings from the Champions League win over Red Star Belgrade.

arts.ttl: Bloodied Barcelona star forced into early exit from Red Star clash
arts.sum: Barcelona star Pau Cubarsí was this evening forced into a premature departure from the club’s meeting with Red Star Belgrade. Hansi Flick’s Barca are of course currently locked in action…
